    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Armor
    Represents an armor item that can be equipped by the hero.
    Backpack
    Represents the hero's backpack which can hold various items.
    CombatEngine
    CombatEngine handles the combat mechanics between the hero and enemies.
    Controller
    Controller class to handle user interactions and game logic.
    Dungeon
    Represents a dungeon consisting of multiple floors.
    Enemy
    Represents an enemy in the game with attributes such as health points, attack, defense, block, and gold drop.
    EnemyAction
    Enum representing possible actions an enemy can take during combat.
    Floor
    Represents a floor in the dungeon consisting of a grid of rooms.
    GameState
    GameState manages the overall state of the game, including the dungeon, hero, backpack, current position, and combat status.
    Gold
    Represents a gold item that can be collected by the hero.
    Hero
    Represents the hero character in the game with attributes such as health points, energy, mana, and block.
    Item
    Represents a generic item that can be stored in the hero's backpack.
    LootTables
    Provides loot tables for different floors and enemy drops in the game.
    Main
    Main class to start the Backpack Hero game.
    ManaStone
    Represents a mana stone item that can be used by the hero to gain mana.
    Position
    Represents a position in a 2D grid with x and y coordinates.
    Rarity
    Enum representing the rarity levels of items in the game.
    Room
    Represents a room in the dungeon.
    RoomType
    Represents the type of a room in the dungeon.
    Shape
    Represents the shape of an item in the backpack.
    View
    View class responsible for rendering the game state onto the screen.
    Weapon
    Represents a weapon item that can be used by the hero to deal damage.
